channel.title: How do i connect my no-ip ip to my server?
channel.description:
I dont have a clue how.My friends got a server but he wont help me :mad: .
So can anyone help me i can only connect to my server via localhost -.-

item.source: How do i connect my no-ip ip to my server?

item.title: How do i connect my no-ip ip to my server?
item.dc:creator: @legendofjon legendofjon
item.description:
@legendofjon wrote:

You can kept the default which is 43594 or
you can make ur own by doing this

  1. go to http://portforward.com/store/pfconfig.htm
    2)go down until you see Download PFConfig! , download it
  2. go to http://portforward.com/store/pfconfigtour.htm
    4)YOUR NOT FINDING HALF LIFE, that’s just an example, look for hamatachi.

    At the main screen of PFConfig, Start by finding Hamatachi from the list of applications.


When you click “Forward This App” a new window pops up asking you where you want to foward the ports for Hamatachi. simply click “Finish”
6)

The correct ports for Hamatachi will be added to your list of Forwarded Applications. Continue to add any other applications you want until you are done. When you are ready, click the “Update Router” button to have PFConfig send all of your new settings to your router.
7)
It really is that easy! Hamatachi gets added to your router

100% credits to http://portforward.com/store/pfconfigtour.htm

Read full topic
